dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: Hello, I'm on a quest to save the kingdom.

dialogue.speaker: NPC Guard
dialogue.text: Citizens are being attacked by dark creatures. We need your help!

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I'm on it! Where can I find the source of these attacks?

dialogue.speaker: NPC Sage
dialogue.text: The dark creatures are coming from the cursed forest. Be careful, it's full of traps.
